items.name: Tilegame
items.intro: A mobile puzzle game, developed as part of a team of four.

items.name: Sudoku solver
items.intro: A sudoku puzzle solver, using a recursive backtracking algorithm.

items.name: Bitter
items.intro: A simple Twitter clone. Fullstack application with a RESTful API and PostgreSQL database

items.name: Sorting algorithms
items.intro: Visualisations for common sorting algorithms such as Quicksort, Merge sort and Heapsort.

items.name: Anki Pitch Accents
items.intro: An addon for the flashcard software Anki that generates pitch accent diagrams for Japanese words.

items.name: Graph traversals
items.intro: Visualisations for DFS (generating mazes) and BFS (finding a shortest path).

items.name: Project Euler and Advent of Code
